pages.name: Registration
userStoryIndex: As a customer, I want to be able to register, so that I can have an account
As a worker, I want to be able to register, so that I can have an account

pages.name: Login
userStoryIndex: As a customer, I want to be able to login, so that I can start using the app
As a worker, I want to be able to login, so that I can start using the app
As an admin, I want to be able to login, so that I can start the management of the e-commerce

pages.name: Logout
userStoryIndex: As a customer, I want to have a specific button in the pages of the application, that allow me to logout
